iti32:2.1_0: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
iti32:2.3_0: Pāpakena ca sīlena, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
iti32:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye”ti.
iti32:4.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
